competition_summary.context: petition and Innovation Act (BPCIA) Litigation Amgen Inc. et al. v. Sandoz Inc., et al. On August 23, 2023, the U.S. District Court for the District of New Jersey (New Jersey District Court) entered a stipulation and order dismissing without prejudice Sandoz GmbH, Lek Pharmaceuticals d.d., Novartis Pharmaceutical Productions d.o.o. and Novartis AG (collectively “Foreign Defendants”) from the action. Pursuant to the stipulation entered by the New Jersey District Court, the Foreign Defendants agre
